G

gameButtons - Variable in class View.View
A dual-array JButtons to keep record on where the pieces are being placed on the board
gameOver() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Will end the game, if any zombies have reached at the end of the gameboard.
gamePiece - Variable in class Model.Square
The Piece that is occupying the square object
gameWon() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Once all the zombies have been spawned, it will go through all the squares in the board; To see if any zombies are "alive".
getAttack() - Method in class Model.Piece
When getAttack() method is called, it returns the attack damage (int) that the PlantPiece can execute.
getColumnNumber() - Method in class Model.Coordinate
Getter method to retrieve the row number of the coordinate
getColumnNumber() - Method in class Model.Square
Getter method for the column number of the coordinate position
getCoordinate() - Method in class Model.Square
Getter method for the coordinate position
getCost() - Method in class Model.Piece
When getCost() method is called, it returns an integer (int) of how much the PlantPiece costs to place on the board.
getGameButtons() - Method in class View.View
Dual-array JButtons that is used to place or remove plants and zombies on the game board
getHealth() - Method in class Model.Piece
When getHealth() method is called, it returns an integer (int) of how much health the PlantPiece currently has on the board.
getjButtonPanel() - Method in class View.View
Getter for the JPanel filled with JButtons
getjTextArea() - Method in class View.View
Getting the JTextArea for in-game logging
getLogging() - Method in class Controller.Controller
 
getName() - Method in class Model.Piece
When getName() method is called, it returns the PlantPieces object called name, which is a String.
getPeashooter() - Method in class View.View
Getting or Creating a Peashooter at the specific point of the game board
getPiece() - Method in class Model.Square
Getter method for the game piece on the square
getPopupMenu() - Method in class View.View
JPopupMenu shown in every JButton
getRowNumber() - Method in class Model.Coordinate
Getter method to retrieve the column number of the coordinate
getRowNumber() - Method in class Model.Square
Getter method for the row number of the coordinate position
getShortName() - Method in class Model.Piece
When getShortName() method is called, it returns the character (char) that is associated with the PlantPieces object.
getShortName() - Method in enum Model.PlantPieces
When getShortName() method is called, it returns the character (char) that is associated with the Model.PlantPieces object.
getSquare(Coordinate) - Method in class Controller.Controller
Receiving the square at specific coordinate, as the square contains both the coordinate and piece.
getSunflower() - Method in class View.View
Getting or Creating a Sunflower at the specific point of the game board
